css: .app_mcdgoa61zldi__container { padding: 15px; max-width: 100%; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; text-align: center; } .app-light-theme .app_mcdgoa61zldi__container { background: #f8f9fa; color: #212529; } .app-dark-theme .app_mcdgoa61zldi__container { background: #2c3e50; color: #f8f9fa; } .app_mcdgoa61zldi__header { margin-bottom: 15px; } .app_mcdgoa61zldi__title { margin: 0 0 10px 0; font-size: 1.4em; } .app-light-theme .app_mcdgoa61zldi__title { color: #212529; } .app-dark-theme .app_mcdgoa61zldi__title { color: #f8f9fa; } .app_mcdgoa61zldi__info { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; font-size: 0.9em; } .app-light-theme .app_mcdgoa61zldi__info { color: #495057; } .app-dark-theme .app_mcdgoa61zldi__info { color: #e9ecef; } .app_mcdgoa61zldi__game-area { margin: 15px 0; display: flex; justify-content: center; } .app_mcdgoa61zldi__grid { display: inline-grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(8, 35px); grid-template-rows: repeat(8, 35px); gap: 1px; border: 2px solid; padding: 5px; } .app-light-theme .app_mcdgoa61zldi__grid { border-color: #495057; background: #ffffff; } .app-dark-theme .app_mcdgoa61zldi__grid { border-color: #ced4da; background: #34495e; } .app_mcdgoa61zldi__cell { width: 35px; height: 35px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 20px; border-radius: 3px; } .app-light-theme .app_mcdgoa61zldi__cell { background: #e9ecef; } .app-dark-theme .app_mcdgoa61zldi__cell { background: #495057; } .app_mcdgoa61zldi__wall { background: #6c757d !important; } .app_mcdgoa61zldi__controls { margin: 15px 0; } .app_mcdgoa61zldi__btn { padding: 8px 16px; margin: 0 5px; border: none; border-radius: 5px; cursor: pointer; font-size: 0.9em; min-height: 44px; } .app-light-theme .app_mcdgoa61zldi__btn { background: #007bff; color: #ffffff; } .app-dark-theme .app_mcdgoa61zldi__btn { background: #0d6efd; color: #ffffff; } .app_mcdgoa61zldi__btn:hover:not(:disabled) { opacity: 0.8; } .app_mcdgoa61zldi__btn:disabled { opacity: 0.5; cursor: not-allowed; } .app_mcdgoa61zldi__instructions { margin-top: 15px; font-size: 0.8em; } .app-light-theme .app_mcdgoa61zldi__instructions { color: #6c757d; } .app-dark-theme .app_mcdgoa61zldi__instructions { color: #ced4da; }
javascript: let app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState = { currentLevel: 0, playerPos: {x: 1, y: 1}, boxes: [], targets: [], moves: 0, grid: [], gridSize: 8 }; const app_mcdgoa61zldi_levels = [ { player: {x: 1, y: 1}, boxes: [{x: 3, y: 2}, {x: 4, y: 3}], targets: [{x: 6, y: 2}, {x: 6, y: 3}], walls: [{x: 0, y: 0}, {x: 1, y: 0}, {x: 2, y: 0}, {x: 3, y: 0}, {x: 4, y: 0}, {x: 5, y: 0}, {x: 6, y: 0}, {x: 7, y: 0}, {x: 0, y: 1}, {x: 7, y: 1}, {x: 0, y: 2}, {x: 7, y: 2}, {x: 0, y: 3}, {x: 7, y: 3}, {x: 0, y: 4}, {x: 1, y: 4}, {x: 2, y: 4}, {x: 3, y: 4}, {x: 4, y: 4}, {x: 5, y: 4}, {x: 6, y: 4}, {x: 7, y: 4}] }, { player: {x: 1, y: 1}, boxes: [{x: 2, y: 2}, {x: 3, y: 2}, {x: 4, y: 2}], targets: [{x: 5, y: 1}, {x: 5, y: 2}, {x: 5, y: 3}], walls: [{x: 0, y: 0}, {x: 1, y: 0}, {x: 2, y: 0}, {x: 3, y: 0}, {x: 4, y: 0}, {x: 5, y: 0}, {x: 6, y: 0}, {x: 0, y: 1}, {x: 6, y: 1}, {x: 0, y: 2}, {x: 6, y: 2}, {x: 0, y: 3}, {x: 6, y: 3}, {x: 0, y: 4}, {x: 1, y: 4}, {x: 2, y: 4}, {x: 3, y: 4}, {x: 4, y: 4}, {x: 5, y: 4}, {x: 6, y: 4}] } ]; function app_mcdgoa61zldi_initGame() { app_mcdgoa61zldi_loadLevel(0); document.addEventListener('keydown', app_mcdgoa61zldi_handleKeyPress); document.getElementById('app_mcdgoa61zldi_resetBtn').addEventListener('click', app_mcdgoa61zldi_resetLevel); document.getElementById('app_mcdgoa61zldi_nextBtn').addEventListener('click', app_mcdgoa61zldi_nextLevel); } function app_mcdgoa61zldi_loadLevel(levelIndex) { if (levelIndex >= app_mcdgoa61zldi_levels.length) return; const level = app_mcdgoa61zldi_levels[levelIndex]; app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.currentLevel = levelIndex; app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.playerPos = {...level.player}; app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.boxes = level.boxes.map(box => ({...box})); app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.targets = level.targets.map(target => ({...target})); app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.walls = level.walls.map(wall => ({...wall})); app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.moves = 0; app_mcdgoa61zldi_updateDisplay(); app_mcdgoa61zldi_renderGrid(); } function app_mcdgoa61zldi_renderGrid() { const grid = document.getElementById('app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameGrid'); grid.innerHTML = ''; for (let y = 0; y < app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.gridSize; y++) { for (let x = 0; x < app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.gridSize; x++) { const cell = document.createElement('div'); cell.className = 'app_mcdgoa61zldi__cell'; const isWall = app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.walls.some(wall => wall.x === x && wall.y === y); const isTarget = app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.targets.some(target => target.x === x && target.y === y); const isBox = app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.boxes.some(box => box.x === x && box.y === y); const isPlayer = app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.playerPos.x === x && app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.playerPos.y === y; if (isWall) { cell.className += ' app_mcdgoa61zldi__wall'; cell.textContent = '🧱'; } else if (isPlayer) { cell.textContent = '🧑'; } else if (isBox) { cell.textContent = '📦'; } else if (isTarget) { cell.textContent = '🎯'; } grid.appendChild(cell); } } } function app_mcdgoa61zldi_handleKeyPress(event) { let dx = 0, dy = 0; switch(event.key.toLowerCase()) { case 'w': case 'arrowup': dy = -1; break; case 's': case 'arrowdown': dy = 1; break; case 'a': case 'arrowleft': dx = -1; break; case 'd': case 'arrowright': dx = 1; break; default: return; } event.preventDefault(); app_mcdgoa61zldi_movePlayer(dx, dy); } function app_mcdgoa61zldi_movePlayer(dx, dy) { const newX = app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.playerPos.x + dx; const newY = app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.playerPos.y + dy; if (newX < 0 || newX >= app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.gridSize || newY < 0 || newY >= app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.gridSize) return; if (app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.walls.some(wall => wall.x === newX && wall.y === newY)) return; const boxAtNewPos = app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.boxes.find(box => box.x === newX && box.y === newY); if (boxAtNewPos) { const boxNewX = newX + dx; const boxNewY = newY + dy; if (boxNewX < 0 || boxNewX >= app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.gridSize || boxNewY < 0 || boxNewY >= app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.gridSize) return; if (app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.walls.some(wall => wall.x === boxNewX && wall.y === boxNewY)) return; if (app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.boxes.some(box => box.x === boxNewX && box.y === boxNewY)) return; boxAtNewPos.x = boxNewX; boxAtNewPos.y = boxNewY; } app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.playerPos.x = newX; app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.playerPos.y = newY; app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.moves++; app_mcdgoa61zldi_updateDisplay(); app_mcdgoa61zldi_renderGrid(); app_mcdgoa61zldi_checkWin(); } function app_mcdgoa61zldi_checkWin() { const allBoxesOnTargets = app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.boxes.every(box => app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.targets.some(target => target.x === box.x && target.y === box.y)); if (allBoxesOnTargets) { document.getElementById('app_mcdgoa61zldi_nextBtn').disabled = false; setTimeout(() => alert('Level completed! Click Next Level to continue.'), 100); } } function app_mcdgoa61zldi_updateDisplay() { document.getElementById('app_mcdgoa61zldi_levelNum').textContent = app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.currentLevel + 1; document.getElementById('app_mcdgoa61zldi_moveCount').textContent = app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.moves; } function app_mcdgoa61zldi_resetLevel() { app_mcdgoa61zldi_loadLevel(app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.currentLevel); document.getElementById('app_mcdgoa61zldi_nextBtn').disabled = true; } function app_mcdgoa61zldi_nextLevel() { const nextLevel = app_mcdgoa61zldi_gameState.currentLevel + 1; if (nextLevel < app_mcdgoa61zldi_levels.length) { app_mcdgoa61zldi_loadLevel(nextLevel); document.getElementById('app_mcdgoa61zldi_nextBtn').disabled = true; } else { alert('Congratulations! You completed all levels!'); } } app_mcdgoa61zldi_initGame();

promptHistory.prompt:
You are an expert web developer specializing in creating modular, theme-aware web applications.
Your task is to generate HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code for a new app based on user requests.

        
TASK:
You are creating a functional app for a windowed operating system interface.

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:
1. Create a COMPLETE, FUNCTIONAL app that works in a window
2. The app will be placed inside a window with ID "content_app_mcdgoa61zldi"
3. Use ONLY vanilla HTML, CSS, and JavaScript - no external libraries
4. Make the app responsive and fit well in a window (300-600px wide)
5. Include ALL necessary functionality for the requested app
6. Use modern, clean UI design

RESPONSE FORMAT - Return ONLY a JSON object with this structure:
{
  "title": "App Name",
  "icon": "📱",
  "html": "complete HTML content",
  "css": "complete CSS styles",
  "javascript": "complete JavaScript functionality"
}

ICON REQUIREMENTS:
- Choose a single UTF-8 emoji that best represents the app's function
- Examples: 📅 for calendar, 🧮 for calculator, 📝 for text editor, 🎮 for games, 📊 for charts, etc.
- The icon should be intuitive and clearly represent the app's purpose

CONTENT RULES:
- Always create BOTH the User Interface AND the Logic (JavaScript)
- For interactive elements (buttons, inputs, forms), ALWAYS include JavaScript
- CRITICAL: Use addEventListener in JavaScript, NOT onclick attributes in HTML
- Give all interactive elements unique IDs and reference them in JavaScript
- IMPORTANT: onclick attributes will NOT work because JavaScript runs in isolated scope
- Make sure you do not break the Response Format - return a valid JSON object

    

NAMESPACE ISOLATION REQUIREMENTS:
- ALL HTML element IDs MUST be prefixed with "app_mcdgoa61zldi_" (e.g., id="app_mcdgoa61zldi_button1")
- ALL CSS classes MUST be prefixed with "app_mcdgoa61zldi__" (e.g., class="app_mcdgoa61zldi__container")
- ALL JavaScript variables and functions MUST be scoped to avoid conflicts
- ALL custom events MUST be prefixed with "app_mcdgoa61zldi:" (e.g., "app_mcdgoa61zldi:dataChanged")
- Use querySelector with app-specific selectors: document.querySelector('#app_mcdgoa61zldi_elementId')


ESSENTIAL CSS GUIDELINES FOR THEME SUPPORT AND ACCESSIBILITY:

TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS:
1. Use semantic HTML with proper button elements and unique IDs
2. Center all content horizontally and vertically
3. Responsive design that adapts to window size
4. Clean, modern appearance with proper spacing
5. CSS: Keep simple, no line breaks, avoid complex selectors
6. HTML: Use single quotes for attributes to avoid JSON conflicts. NEVER use onclick attributes - use IDs instead
7. IMPORTANT: class names can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, underscores, and dashes
8. MANDATORY: the font color of an element should always contrast with the background color
9. IMPORTANT: Always check, that all css classes used in the html have been generated
10. MANDATORY: check that css classes are effectively applied to the HTML elements

CRITICAL THEME REQUIREMENTS:
- Apps automatically inherit .app-light-theme or .app-dark-theme classes
- ALWAYS design for BOTH light and dark modes
- Current theme: light

MANDATORY CONTRAST RULES:
1. NEVER light text on light backgrounds or dark text on dark backgrounds
2. Display text must be clearly visible against display background
3. Use CSS theme classes: .app-light-theme and .app-dark-theme for all styling
4. MANDADOTRY: make sure text is always readable against the background color
5. For input fields, always set the color attibute
6. MANDATORY: make sure button text is always readable against the button background color

APPROVED COLOR PALETTE:

Light Mode:
- Backgrounds: #ffffff, #f8f9fa, #e9ecef
- Text: #212529 (primary), #495057 (secondary), #6c757d (muted)
- Buttons: #007bff (primary), #28a745 (success), #dc3545 (danger), #ffc107 (warning with dark text)

Dark Mode:
- Backgrounds: #2c3e50, #34495e, #495057
- Text: #f8f9fa (primary), #e9ecef (secondary), #ced4da (muted)
- Buttons: #0d6efd (primary), #198754 (success), #dc3545 (danger), #ffc107 (warning with dark text)

SAFE COMBINATIONS:
✅ #ffffff text on #007bff, #28a745, #dc3545 backgrounds
✅ #212529 text on #ffc107 background (warning)
✅ #212529 text on #ffffff background (light mode)
✅ #f8f9fa text on #2c3e50 background (dark mode)

❌ #ffffff text on #ffc107 (white on yellow - FORBIDDEN)
❌ Light text on light backgrounds
❌ Dark text on dark backgrounds

IMPLEMENTATION:
- Use theme-aware CSS classes for different modes
- Include hover/focus states for all interactive elements
- Ensure 44px minimum touch targets
- Keep responsive design (300-600px window width)


ESSENTIAL JAVASCRIPT CODE GENERATION GUIDELINES:
- Write your JavaScript to handle all user interactions using addEventListener pattern
- Ensure all form elements, buttons, and interactive areas have proper event handling
- Test your logic mentally to ensure the app will work as expected
- Keep code simple and avoid overly complex string manipulations that could cause parsing issues
- The JSON must use double quotes " for all keys and string values
- Escape all double quotes inside the JavaScript string as "
- Escape all backslashes  as \
- Use 
 for line breaks in multiline JavaScript code
- Ensure the result can be parsed with JSON.parse() in JavaScript
- Write clean JavaScript with addEventListener for all interactions
- CRITICAL JSON FORMATTING: Ensure all strings are properly escaped for JSON
- Avoid complex JavaScript with many quotes, brackets, or special characters
- Keep JavaScript simple and readable to prevent JSON parsing errors
- Always use document.getElementById() and addEventListener() pattern
- Keep Javascript scripts simple and avoid complex string operations that could break JSON
- All declared variables must be prefixed with "app_mcdgoa61zldi_" to avoid conflicts
        Now create a functional app for: I want to play sokoban

IMAGE CONTEXT:
The user has provided 1 screenshot(s) to help with app creation. Please analyze the provided images and incorporate any relevant visual information, UI elements, design patterns, or functionality shown in the screenshots into your app creation.
